name: Grey Heritage: Faded Vision Demo
description:
This is a demo for my current commercial project, Grey Heritage: Faded Vision. It's made with the SRPG Studio engine.

You are an Exiled Prince reclaiming his rightful birthright. 

This demo is about 40-60 minute long. It's the first chapter of the game, but it's quite a long one! 

Please consider donating, all of the money will help fund my talented artist on this project.

If you want to see weekly updates, consider following my twitter

https://twitter.com/BTrainStudio
